reviewText: It may be just me, but several of the movies of a foreign origin I have watched lately left me cold. This was one of them. Nothing original, ugly situations, some very ugly people (their behavior not their physical appearance). So boring I could follow what plot there appeared to be by putting the player on X2 speed and not even bothering with the subtitles. The one word I could use to describe this cinematic oddity is 'backward'.
